About.title: Stories & Posts
About.description: We create captivating stories and posts at cinema and Hollywood level that showcase your brand perfectly. Webomo takes care of the complete content creation and publication on your social media channels – delivered weekly for the next 12 months.

AboutHiver.title: Stand Out from the Crowd
AboutHiver.description: Ensure your brand perception is unique and distinguishes you from all others. Use creative marketing strategies and authentic stories to forge an emotional connection with your target audience. By continuously introducing innovations and listening to customer feedback, you can further strengthen your brand and preserve its uniqueness.

description.part2: photo shoot, we create a comprehensive selection of visuals for your social media channels. Whether it's services, products, objects, or much more, we ensure your brand is presented effectively and purposefully.

About2Hiver.title: Win Your Target Audience
About2Hiver.description: Reach and win your target audience by communicating your message effectively. Use engaging content and creative approaches to pique your audience's interest. Clear and authentic communication also fosters trust and loyalty to your brand.

description.part1: A full-day video shoot where we capture footage of your company – premises – interviews – customer feedback, and much more. We deliver footage in
description.part2: that presents your brand authentically and impressively.

About3Hiver.title: Customers Pay Higher Prices
About3Hiver.description: Let your customers feel the added value of your brand so they willingly invest in higher prices. By offering them a unique experience and excellent service, you create an emotional bond. This makes price a secondary concern, while the quality and benefits of your products take center stage.

AboutWebsite.title: Website Development
AboutWebsite.description: From the initial idea to go-live, we stand by your side to showcase your brand in the best digital light. With responsive design, lightning-fast load times, and a user experience that convinces, we create sustainable online experiences. Thanks to the latest technologies, your website remains not only state-of-the-art but also future-proof. Together, we make your digital vision a reality.
AboutWebsite.cardSubtitle: Creative, powerful, and always one click ahead.

AboutPrint.title: Print and Graphic Design
AboutPrint.description: We offer tailor-made print solutions, from high-quality brochures to custom-designed promotional materials. Our graphic design includes the creative development of logos, corporate identities, and marketing collateral that visually strengthen your brand. With our expertise, we professionally implement your ideas and ensure a strong visual presence.
AboutPrint.cardSubtitle: Creative, powerful, and always one click ahead.

AboutBusinessOne.title: Join Our Community.
AboutBusinessOne.description: Whether you're a content creator, coach, or an Instagram user. At Webomo, we offer everyone the chance to succeed and earn money. Position yourself in our community now to earn commissions and experience the flexibility of future work.
AboutBusinessOne.subHeadlinedescription: Earning money has never been easier.

AboutBusinessTwo.title: Your Success Is Our Priority
AboutBusinessTwo.description: We support you with resources and acquisitions to help you generate as many customers as possible. Our resources and support are designed to help you grow your team or portfolio. You receive creative marketing templates from us and your own dashboard with detailed performance metrics.

AboutBusinessThree.title: Webomo Incentives
AboutBusinessThree.description: Webomo Incentives take you to the most beautiful places in the world. You experience team-building adventures in the mountains and then relax in luxurious coastal cities, where you enjoy culture, delicious cuisine, and unforgettable moments – all to inspire you to achieve your goals.

description.part1: We amplify emotions in your target audience. Your content such as images, videos, and content is created in
description.part2: . Your product & service campaigns are on another level.

HeroAboutUs.title: Our Vision
HeroAboutUs.mission: Webomo is an AI-powered marketing agency specializing in creating high-quality social media content. Our focus is providing companies with professional 12-month support for sustainable growth. With customized strategies, we help our clients increase brand awareness and build a stronger presence on digital platforms. Our innovative AI technology enables us to deliver effective, data-driven content tailored directly to target audiences. Webomo's primary goal: to sustainably increase our clients' revenue and fully exploit their growth potential.

WhoWeAre.title: More Than Just a Team
WhoWeAre.smallTeamDescription: At Webomo, we prioritize quality over quantity – in both our work and our team. With agility, innovation, and passion, we focus entirely on maximizing your success.
WhoWeAre.growthDescription: Founded in 2023, Webomo is profitable and already helps over 200 businesses unlock their full potential. With a solid foundation and great ambition, we are building a healthy, dynamically growing company that inspires and succeeds.
WhoWeAre.trustedDescription: Leaders of other companies value collaborating with Webomo because we offer clear visions and creative solutions that build trust and foster sustainable growth and shared success.

OurValues.title: Our Values
OurValues.candidFeedbackDescription: At Webomo, we value honest and thoughtful feedback to challenge the status quo. It is our key to not only improving our work but also our processes continuously.
OurValues.shipFastDescription: At Webomo, we prioritize progress over perfection. Our focus on rapid execution enables us to learn early and continuously improve.
OurValues.buildItDescription: At Webomo, we are all trusted experts proud of our craft. We place great value on consistency and making a real impact on our users – regardless of the role we take on.
OurValues.stayOpenDescription: At Webomo, we are always open to new ideas and foster a culture of transparency. We work together and share our knowledge to grow and innovate continuously.

Cta.title: Take Your Social Media to the Next Level with Webomo
Cta.description: Join Webomo's expert-led social media services and start building a strong online presence. From strategy to engagement – we have the tools to help you grow.

FAQ.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Have questions? Here you'll find answers to the most common questions about our products and services.
FAQ.faq1Details: Webomo is a marketing AI tool that simultaneously acts as a professional marketing agency. It helps businesses and individuals maximize their reach. By combining AI tools with personal expert support, Webomo brings efficiency and creativity into perfect harmony.
FAQ.faq2Details: Webomo revolutionizes content creation by producing creative video posts, stories, and more for social media channels like Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, and TikTok. With automated publishing over 12 months and comprehensive reporting metrics, it optimizes reach and engagement.
FAQ.faq3Details: Content is created through individual photo shoots and video recordings directly on-site with clients. The material is fed into an AI that then generates expressive content. Direct client contact ensures strategies are implemented authentically and vibrantly.
FAQ.faq4Details: Webomo can be used by businesses and individuals looking to expand their customer base, increase brand awareness, or boost revenue. It's suitable for both small companies and large brands aiming to improve their visibility and reach.
FAQ.faq5Title: What benefits & value does Webomo provide?
FAQ.faq5Details: Webomo saves valuable time, reduces costs, and delivers precise insights through AI-driven analytics. With tailored strategies, Webomo enables a significant revenue increase and long-term success for businesses.
FAQ.faq6Title: Why is Webomo so popular among businesses and individuals?
FAQ.faq6Details: Webomo offers a unique opportunity to increase reach through affiliate marketing. The international approach opens doors to local and global markets and creates the ideal environment for success – whether for startups or established brands.
FAQ.faq7Title: Why does Webomo work with subscription models?
FAQ.faq7Details: Webomo offers flexible subscription models that adapt to individual needs. Customers benefit from automatic updates and new features that stay up-to-date without additional effort. This reduces complexity and costs in marketing.

FaqBusiness.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqBusiness.description: Have questions? Here you’ll find answers to the most common questions about the Webomo-Business partner program.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness1Details: The Webomo-Business Program is an affiliate marketing tool. You can generate recurring income by making referrals. It’s designed for people who want to earn money with today’s marketing tools and build a second source of income.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness2Title: How does the Webomo-Business Program work?
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness2Details: After you register successfully, you’ll get an affiliate link and ready-to-share content in your personal dashboard. Once a week, you post the content on your account as either a post or a campaign.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness3Details: You must be at least 18 years old and have at least 100 Instagram followers.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness4Title: Can I use the Webomo-Business Program from any country?
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness4Details: No. The Webomo-Business Program is available only to residents of Switzerland, Germany, Liechtenstein, Austria, Italy, and France.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness5Details: By registering, you agree to the Webomo-Business Program guidelines. You must publish the provided content on your Instagram account once a week and hold a valid license to participate and access the tool.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness6Details: As a Webomo Business Partner, you can link new users to your Business link. This increases your potential annual earnings. Linked users appear in your personal dashboard.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness7Title: How can I earn money with Webomo-Business?
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness7Details: By selling packages (Basic, Pro, or Business) and licenses. As a Business Partner, you receive a unique link for sharing our services, and earn commissions on every successful package or license sale.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness8Title: How much are the commissions for packages and licenses?
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness8Details: You earn an annual commission of CHF 1,000 for each package sold—regardless of Basic, Pro, or Business. Additionally, you can sell the Webomo-Business tool license and earn CHF 300 per license sold each year via your link.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness9Details: Commissions are paid on the 30th of the following month, to your bank account or credit card. All payments are made in CHF (Swiss francs), regardless of your country.
FaqBusiness.faqBusiness10Details: Access to the dashboard and related features (managing Affiliate-Again and Affiliate-Business links) requires a license purchase. Schedule a free call to find the license option that best fits your needs.

Footer.companyDescription: We help you boost revenue with AI-powered marketing and achieve your goals

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy describes how Webomo (owned by Cengiz Cokickli) collects, uses, and protects personal data.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: We collect personal data such as name and email address through forms on our website for marketing purposes.

dataUse.title: Data Use
dataUse.description: The collected data is used to provide services, respond to inquiries, and conduct marketing campaigns.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.description: Your data may be shared with trusted third parties such as Google Analytics, Vercel, and Facebook Pixel to improve our website's functionality and analysis.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.description: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data. Contact us if you have questions about how your data is processed.

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies Policy
cookiesPolicy.description: We use cookies to enhance user experience and analyze website performance. This includes third-party cookies from Google and Meta.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: These Terms and Conditions (T&Cs) govern the use of the Webomo website (owned by Cengiz Cokickli) and all services offered on it.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.description: Users agree to use the website and its content in compliance with applicable law. Prohibited actions, such as spreading malicious code, are strictly forbidden.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content, trademarks, and materials on this website are the property of Webomo or its licensors and are protected by copyright laws.

limitationsLiability.title: Limitation of Liability
limitationsLiability.description: Webomo is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the website.

modifications.title: Modifications to T&Cs
modifications.description: Webomo reserves the right to modify these T&Cs at any time. Changes take effect as soon as they are published on the website.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.description: These T&Cs are governed by Swiss law. Disputes will be exclusively handled by Swiss courts.

registry.title: Registry
registry.description: Webomo is registered in the Swiss Commercial Register, registration number: CH-123.456.789.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: The contents of this website have been created with the utmost care. However, we do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the content.

Timeline.title: How do we implement this?
Timeline.subtitle: Discover the five steps that will lead you to a successful partnership with WEBOMO.

step1.label: Let's get started
step1.title: Book a free consultation
step1.description: Start your branding journey by scheduling your first consultation. We can't wait to connect with you and help reshape your brand.

step2.label: What do you need?
step2.title: Tailored Strategy
step2.description: During our consultation, we will develop a customized strategy specifically designed for your business needs. Our goal is to create a clear roadmap that outlines your brand’s path to success.

step3.label: Time to execute
step3.title: Implementation
step3.description: Once you approve our proposal, we move into the execution phase. Together, we will implement customized branding strategies and materials to steer your brand in a new direction.

step4.label: Optimization
step4.title: Maximizing Performance
step4.description: We continuously strive to enhance your brand’s performance. With regular market analysis and strategic adjustments, we fine-tune our collaboration for even better results.

CardsBusiness.headline: Become a partner
CardsBusiness.subtitle: Boost your brand’s visibility and market position to attract clients who value exceptional quality.

card1.title: Unlimited Earning Potential
card1.description: There is no income cap. Every year, you build your portfolio, and your revenue grows alongside it.

card2.title: Annual Revenue Instead of One-Time Gains
card2.description: With recurring annual revenue, you secure a stable and predictable income instead of relying on one-off payments.

card3.title: More Freedom
card3.description: Work from anywhere and decide how much and how long you want to work. We support you in growing your team so you can gain more time for yourself.
